verses.1: Pasian aw, Zion ah nangmah phat dingin kilawm a, nangma tunga thuciam sate hong kitungsak ding hi.
verses.2: Thungetna a za pa na hi a, mawhna hangin nangma kiangah mi khempeuh hong pai ding uh hi.
verses.3: Ka mawhnate un kote hong zawh ciangin, nangmah in tuate na hong maisak hi.
verses.4: Nangma inn ah a om dingin na teel na lakte mi nuamsa ahi hi. Nangma biakinn siangtho, na inn sunga hoihna tawh kote ka lungkim ding uh hi.
verses.5: Tuipi gamla pente le leimong khempeuhteʼ lamet, kote a hong hon khia Pasian,
verses.6: a thahatna tawh mualte a bawl, vangliatna tawh a kidim,
verses.7: tuipi gingte, tuihualte, mi gamlumte a daisak pa aw,
verses.8: leimong pek a omte in na hihna limte a kihtak nadingun a kihtakhuai gamtatna zangin, nong hotkhiatna tawh koteʼ ngetna nong pia hi. Nisuahna le nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuhte lungdamna tawh a awng dingin na bawl hi.
verses.9: Nangmah in leitung enin, guah na hong zusak a, leitung a hoihna nakpi takin na behlap hi. Pasianʼ gunpi tui tawh kidim a, leitungah an na piangsak hi. Tua bangin nangmah in na khempeuh na bawl khol hi.
verses.10: Tu-ma-kuakte khempeuh tui tampi tak na buak a, leivumte zalhmai-in, guahtui tawh na nipsak a, a po kungte thupha na pia hi.
verses.11: Nangma hauhna tawh kum na phasak a, na leeng paina khempeuh ah sathau a taak hi.
verses.12: Ganhing tatna, a noptuak mahmah munte ah ganhing honte omin, mualte khempeuh zong lungdamna tawh kidim a,
verses.13: gamlak lo nona munte tuu hon tawh kizemin, kuampite an tawh kidim a, amaute lungdamin awngin la a sa khawm uh hi.
